amendment.description: To require screenings of members of the Armed Forces for Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and other mental health conditions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1451 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To require screenings of members of the Armed Forces for Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and other mental health conditions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1451 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1451 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Landrieu.
